Document.TEXT: Computers & Internet: Newly released market study: Global MEMs Microphone Market 2016-2020 Newly released market study: Global MEMs Microphone Market 2016-2020 Fast Market Research recommends Global MEMs Microphone Market 2016-2020 from TechNavio, now available [ClickPress, Thu Feb 04 2016] A MEMS microphone comprises of a pressure-sensitive diaphragm, which is fixed into a silicon IC and is accompanied by an integrated preamplifier. These devices are integrated with modern digital products, and are widely used in high-quality audio output devices. Smartphones and tablets use MEMS microphones for high-quality voice output. Optimization in technology has resulted in the development of miniaturized MEMS microphones that can be easily integrated into compact electronic products. These devices are also being used in hearing aids due to their noise-suppressing characteristic. Full Report Details at - http://www.fastmr.com/prod/1117702_global_mems_microphone.aspx?afid=301 Technavio's analysts forecast the global MEMS microphone market to grow at a CAGR of 12.06% during the period 2016-2020. Covered in this report The report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global MEMS microphone market during 2016-2020. To calculate the market size, the report considers revenue generated through the global sales of MEMS microphone for mobile phones, consumer electronic devices, and hearing aids. The market is divided into the following segments based on geography: * Americas * APAC * EMEA Technavio's report, Global MEMS Microphone Market 2016-2020, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the market landscape and its growth prospects over the coming years. The report also includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market.
